t: Amazon.com: VersaChop Duo, Large 18 inch X 12 inch Cutting Boards for Kitchen. Totally Natural Organic Moso Bamboo Cutting Board with Two Integrated Stainless Steel Bowls attached for organization and storage.: Home & Kitchen
s: The VERSACHOP Duo is a uniquely designed cutting board that is made from Organic Moso Bamboo and has two integrated stainless steel bowls. Unlike a lot of other cutting boards with containers, your Versachop is easy to clean, which keeps harmful germs out of your food.
